nodes.text: The I-s3a solar ionization reactor was a model of reactor used in Sienar Fleet Systems's TIE/ln space superiority starfighter to power a pair of P-s5.6 twin ion engines. Ship designer Raith Sienar also used this pairing in the prototype TIE Advanced x1 that he designed for the Sith Lord Darth Vader.

The I-s3a solar ionization reactor was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 17. The reactor first appeared in the 1994 Star Wars Legends video game Star Wars: TIE Fighter.
